data.title: Bitdeer Bitcoin Mining Expands With New Canada Facility
data.description:
Bitdeer Bitcoin Mining, led by Jihan Wu, acquired 19 acres in Alberta for $21.7M, securing a 101 MW permit to build a $90M power plant and a 99 MW mining data center.
source: https://coincu.com/305450-bitdeer-bitcoin-mining-expands-with-new-canada

data.title: Report: Cryptocurrency sector lost $10.25 million due to phishing scams in January, with Ethereum accounting for over 80% of the funds
data.description:
Odaily Planet Daily News Blockchain security company Scam Sniffer reported that the number of victims of cryptocurrency phishing scams reached 9,220 in January, with a total of $10.25 million stolen, down 56% from December last year (loss of $23.58 million). However, the report pointed out that criminals have been constantly improving and implementing more sophisticated attack methods.
Among them, Ethereum users were the most affected by phishing scams, accounting for more than 80% of the stolen funds, with losses exceeding $8.6 million, while BNB Chain and Arbitrum users lost $710,000 and $572,000 respectively, and Polygon and Optimism users lost about $191,000 and $82,000 respectively.
The company pointed out that malware-driven attacks dominated. The Uniswap Permit2 vulnerability alone stole $1 million, while direct transfers caused victims to lose $549,000, and another $471,000 was stolen due to transaction simulation scams.
Another growing threat involves scams on Telegram, which have surged by more than 2,000% since November 2024.

data.title: Cryptocurrency Phishing Scams Lead To Significant Losses In January
data.description: According to Odaily, blockchain security firm Scam Sniffer reported that in January, 9,220 victims fell prey to cryptocurrency phishing scams, resulting in a total loss of $10.25 million. This marks a 56% decrease compared to December's $23.58 million losses. Despite the decline, the report highlights that cybercriminals are continuously refining and deploying more sophisticated attack methods. Ethereum users were the most affected, accounting for over 80% of the stolen funds, with losses exceeding $8.6 million. Users of BNB Chain and Arbitrum lost $710,000 and $572,000, respectively, while Polygon and Optimism users faced losses of approximately $191,000 and $82,000. The company noted that malware-driven attacks were predominant. The Uniswap Permit2 vulnerability alone resulted in $1 million being stolen, while direct transfers caused victims to lose $549,000, and transaction simulation scams accounted for $471,000 in losses. Another growing threat involves scams on Telegram, which have surged by over 2,000% since November 2024.

data.title: David Sacks: Crypto regulation is expected to be completed within the next six months
data.description:
Odaily Planet Daily News David Sacks, the White House AI and cryptocurrency director, said in an interview: "I met with the leaders of the House and Senate Banking and Finance Committees on Capitol Hill today. They are very committed to promoting legislation in the House and Senate this year to provide a clear regulatory framework for the digital asset ecosystem to maintain American innovation," adding that this may be completed within the next six months.
Sacks also mentioned that the government hopes to introduce stablecoin innovations that are currently mainly carried out overseas to the United States by allowing stablecoins to be issued domestically. "I think the power of stablecoins is that it can expand the dominance of the US dollar internationally, extend it to the online digital field, and create potential trillions of dollars in new demand for US Treasury bonds."

data.title: A whale deposited 3.07 million RAY to CEX 5 hours ago. If sold, it will make a profit of 5.82 million US dollars.
data.description:
Odaily Planet Daily News According to the monitoring of on-chain analyst @ai_9684xtpa, RAY whale recharged 3.07 million RAY (US$18.58 million) to Binance & Gate.io 5 hours ago, and if sold, it will make a profit of US$5.82 million.
Its source of funds has withdrawn 14.78 million RAY from the exchange at an average price of US$4.15 in the past 7 months, with a value of up to US$61.46 million.
It is worth mentioning that the recharge address also has financial transactions with the "ai16z & ZEREBRO Top7 Whales". Yesterday, the whale recharged US$9.24 million of ai16z to the exchange through this address.

data.title: XRP Ledger is back online after an hour-long outage, user funds unaffected
data.description:
Odaily Planet Daily News Ripple CTO David Schwartz confirmed that Ripple's XRP Ledger has resumed operation after the network outage prevented verification from being released for more than an hour.
XRPL's browser page shows that network activity was frozen at block height 93927174 for 64 minutes before the blockchain was restarted at 10:58 am (UTC time) on February 4.
Schwartz said in an X post on February 4: "It looks like consensus is running, but verification has not been released, causing the network to be interrupted." He added that the validator operator must manually intervene to "select a reasonable starting point" to establish enough consensus to pull the network to a coordinated ledger flow. Schwartz said his observations were preliminary and Ripple was still investigating the root cause.
Schwartz pointed out that only a very small number of unique node list validators were forced to make changes to restart the network, "so it is possible that the network will recover spontaneously."
In addition, RippleX's X account noted that customer funds remained safe throughout the incident. XRPSCAN data shows that there are about 2 million transactions per day, performed by 30,000 to 60,000 unique senders. Therefore, about 88,000 transactions may be delayed due to the network suspension.

data.title: Ark Invest Predicts Bitcoin Price Targets For 2030
data.description: According to Odaily, Ark Invest's latest report outlines potential price targets for Bitcoin by 2030. In a bearish scenario, Bitcoin could reach $300,000. Under a base case scenario, the price is projected to be $710,000. In a bullish scenario, Bitcoin might achieve a value of $1,500,000.

data.title: Bitcoin Spot ETF Sees Significant Inflow
data.description: According to Odaily, recent data monitored by Trader T indicates that the U.S. Bitcoin spot ETF experienced a net inflow of $342.08 million yesterday.

data.title: MicroStrategy Seeks New Capital Markets Director
data.description: According to Odaily, MicroStrategy is actively recruiting for a new Capital Markets Director. This role will oversee various financial and capital market activities, including equity, convertible debt, and preferred stock issuances. The position requires close collaboration with senior leadership and cross-functional teams to execute financing strategies, optimize the balance sheet, and ensure compliance with company policies. Ideal candidates should possess experience in capital markets, structured finance, investment banking, private equity, or public equity investments, along with a strong interest and understanding of Bitcoin.

data.title: UBS Completes Proof Of Concept For Key4 Gold On ZKsync Validium
data.description: According to Odaily, UBS has successfully completed a proof of concept (PoC) by simulating the provision of its Key4 Gold product on ZKsync Validium in a test environment. This initiative aims to explore solutions related to scalability, cost, privacy, interoperability with Ethereum, and the ease of trading assets. ZKsync Validium, a Layer 2 blockchain solution, is designed to scale Ethereum while maintaining data privacy. It was chosen for this PoC deployment to effectively develop the network and enhance interoperability in a testing setting. UBS Key4 Gold offers Swiss retail and wealth clients the direct right to purchase physical gold, facilitating fractional gold investments.
